thread.section_title: The Yorkshire Soap Company Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of yorkshiresoap.co.uk
thread.title: Mary Agnew
thread.title_full: The Yorkshire Soap Company reviewed by Mary Agnew

author: Mary Agnew
title: Mary Agnew
text:
This was my first order with Yorkshire Soap and I am delighted with the products, lovely scent , well wrapped and delivered very quickly.
I would definitely buy again and recommend to anyone , particularly please with the 'chocolate Easter bunny' something a little different to the usual edible kind.
